name: Monday Morning (Tamarantula)
description:
A Sheridan College design week (game jam) game developed in 4-5 days. The game is still a work in progress so some stuff in the game is missing. 

Goal of Game: 

Shovel snow from your driveway while avoiding or throwing the snow onto the NPCs.

Also, try throwing the snow onto the X on the floor. ;)

Controls:

Left mouse click (hold) - pick up snow

Left mouse click (release) - throw snow
